Show / Hide Table of Contents

Namespace OpenAI_API.Audio

Classes

AudioRequest

Parameters for requests made by the TranscriptionEndpoint.

AudioRequest.ResponseFormats

The format of the transcript output. See https://platform.openai.com/docs/api-reference/audio/createTranscription#audio-createtranscription-response_format

AudioResultVerbose

Represents a verbose_json output from the OpenAI Transcribe or Translate endpoints.

AudioResultVerbose.Segment

TextToSpeechEndpoint

The Endpoint for the Text to Speech API. This allows you to generate audio from text. See https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/text-to-speech

TextToSpeechRequest

A request to the TextToSpeechEndpoint.

TextToSpeechRequest.ResponseFormats

The format to return for the generated audio. See https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/text-to-speech/supported-output-formats

TextToSpeechRequest.Voices

Supported voices are alloy, echo, fable, onyx, nova, and shimmer. Previews of the voices are available in the Text to speech guide. See https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/text-to-speech/voice-options.

TranscriptionEndpoint

Transcribe audio into text, with optional translation into English.

Interfaces

ITextToSpeechEndpoint

The Endpoint for the Text to Speech API. This allows you to generate audio from text. See https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/text-to-speech

ITranscriptionEndpoint

Transcribe audio into text, with optional translation into English.
